news.title: Constance Marten and Mark Gordon jailed for 14 years over baby's death
news.summary: The couple were found guilty in July after a lengthy retrial at the Old Bailey.

news.title: PM says he would never have appointed Mandelson had he known full Epstein links
news.summary: The PM says a due diligence process was gone through before Lord Mandelson was appointed US ambassador.

news.title: Charlie Kirk suspect linked to crime scene by DNA, says FBI chief
news.summary: Kash Patel says Tyler Robinson's DNA was found on towel wrapping suspected murder weapon.

news.title: Starmer aide resigns after explicit texts about Abbott surface
news.summary: Downing Street said the messages about the veteran MP were "appalling and unacceptable".

news.title: Israel demolishes more high-rise towers as Gaza City offensive ramps up
news.summary: BBC Verify's Merlyn Thomas looks at the latest Israeli strikes on buildings in Gaza City city over the weekend.

news.title: Tory MP and shadow minister Danny Kruger defects to Reform
news.summary: The East Wiltshire MP said the Conservatives were no longer the main party of opposition.

news.title: 'What a legend!' - Duplantis clears 6.30m to break pole vault world record
news.summary: Armand Duplantis breaks the men's pole vault world record for the 14th time, clearing 6.30m attempt after winning gold at the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo.

news.title: Eurovision has never been about politics, says BBC boss Tim Davie
news.summary: The director general says the corporation is "aware of the concerns" around Israel's participation.

news.title: 'I'm just a mixed-race kid from Kirkby', says Stephen Graham after Emmys win
news.summary: Stephen Graham is emotional as he accepts an Emmy award for his role in the hit series Adolescence.

news.title: Prince Harry says his 'conscience is clear' over Royal revelations
news.summary: The Duke of Sussex spoke to the Guardian about his family and the upcoming Associated Newspapers case.
